item.description: Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1420; 06:59PM; 9601 N Columbus Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3yJaObM; North Hills; 19 LAFD Firefighters took just 24 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish a fully involved "mobile home" and vegetation, their well-coordinated offense preventing flames from spreading to exposures. No injury. Fire cause under investigation; FS 7; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E287 E7 E75 RA7 T87; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1420; 06:35PM; 9601 N Columbus Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3yJaObM; North Hills; Firefighters responding to a reported tree fire discovered a fully involved "mobile" home and vegetation burning. Offensive firefighting operations with multiple "exposures" reported; FS 7; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E287 E7 E75 RA7 T87; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Hiker Rescue; INC#1343; 05:48PM; End of Wonder View Drive; MAP: https://bit.ly/3yMlaHT; Hollywood Hills; LAFD Ground and Air response to a pair of lost young adult female hikers discovered and now being aided by LAFD ground crews approximately 50' off a utility road in a wilderness area east of the the Tree of Life trail, about three-quarters (0.75) of a mile northeast of the end of Wonder View Drive. Only one is injured (condition undetermined), complaining of head, neck and back pain and an inability to walk. She is to be hoisted into a hovering LAFD rescue helicopter for continued in-flight care during direct transport to a regional trauma center. Her uninjured hiking companion (unknown affiliation) is being assisted in safely walking from the location by LAFD ground crews.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 BC5 E227 E76 H1 H4 HA1 HA4 RA76 RH114 T27; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1105; 05:10PM; 3219 W Washington Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FeyKq3; Arlington Heights; KNOCKDOWN: 45 firefighters extinguished the fire in 23 minutes. The approximately 75' x 75' unit housed an auto parts/body shop. Crews contained the fire to the unit of origin, defending the two adjacent units. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC18 E215 E226 E229 E29 E94 RA26 SQ21 T15 T26 T29; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1105; 04:47PM; 3219 W Washington Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FeyKq3; Arlington Heights; One story row of commercial units with heavy fire showing from one unit. One additional task force requested. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 E226 E229 E29 SQ21 T26 T29; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1176; 04:55PM; 4201 N Via Marisol; MAP: https://bit.ly/3e69Gpc; Montecito Heights; KNOCKDOWN: 19 firefighters extinguished the fire in 12 minutes with no injuries reported. The building is mixed garden style and center hall. Crews contained the fire to the kitchen in the fire unit. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 47; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC2 E12 E212 E47 RA47 T12; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1176; 04:43PM; 4201 N Via Marisol; MAP: https://bit.ly/3e69Gpc; Montecito Heights; Three story apartments over parking with smoke and fire showing from the 2nd floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 47; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC2 E12 E212 E47 RA47 T12; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0801; 01:00PM; 13730 W Desmond St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ElVB1L; Pacoima; The first responding fire company is handling the RV fire. There is no extension into the commercial building and no injuries reported. No further details.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E298 E7 T75 T98; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0801; 12:48PM; 13730 W Desmond St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ElVB1L; Pacoima; Large RV well involved in fire, exposing a row of commercial units. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E298 E7 T75 T98; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0592; 10:56AM; 829 W Hamilton Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3EaPH34; San Pedro; KNOCKDOWN: 24 firefighters extinguished the fire in 11 minutes with no injuries reported. Crews held the fire to the garage, preventing it from extending into the attic or attached home. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 101; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E101 E112 E248 E36 RA848 T48; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart
